snippet.title: Restoring Falmay - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Hey everyone! Just thought about making a trailer for Restoring Falmay, my entry to a certain RTP game jam. Featuring an adventurous tale of saving the fairy kingdom of Falmay from corruption.

Download A Sun-Kissed Fantasy on Itch for free:
https://starmage.itch.io/restoring-falmay

Other LINKS:

Wishlist BlueSkies 3 on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2842960/BlueSkies_3/

Play Stellar Bewitching for free on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2561090/Stellar_Bewitching/

(Christmas theme'd boss-rush turn-based RPG)
Heroes of the Seasons on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2782260/Heroes_of_the_Seasons/

(My first commercial game )
Rave Heart on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1375880/Rave_Heart/

More info on Rave Heart:
https://starmage.itch.io/rave-heart​
https://rpgmaker.net/games/10335/​
